original_text: The man of God then became angry with King Jehoash. He said, ‘You should have hit the ground five times or six times. Then you would have completely destroyed Syria's army. But now you will only win three battles against Syria.’
korean_text: 하나님의 사람이 노하여 이르되 왕이 대여섯 번을 칠 것이니이다 그리하였더면 왕이 아람을 진멸하기까지 쳤으리이다 그런즉 이제는 왕이 아람을 세 번만 치리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: The man of God then became angry
You should have hit the ground five times
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 다섯 번이나 땅을 쳤어야 했다

sentences.original_text: Then you would have completely destroyed
you will only win three battles
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 오직 세 번의 전투만 이길 것이다
